      • getValuesAsXEqualsSek

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getValuesAsXEqualsSek(java.math.BigDecimal rate)
        Changes the rates from 1 SEK is worth x OTHERCURRENCY to 1 OTHERCURRENCY is worth x SEK.
        Parameters:
        rate - The ratio between SEK and OTHERCURENCY.
        Returns:
        The ratio between OTHERCURRENCY and SEK. Invalid rates return 0.

      • getMaxDeltaCurrency

                                            java.time.LocalDate toDate)

        Parameters:
        fromDate - From this date
        toDate - To this date
        Returns:
        The highest delta currency (or EUR if no comparable data)

      • getMaxVolatilityCurrency

        public java.lang.String getMaxVolatilityCurrency(java.time.LocalDate fromDate,
                                                 java.time.LocalDate toDate)
        This method calculates the currency with the highest volatility in a specified period. In other words, the currency with the largest difference between its highMark and lowMark in this period.
        Parameters:
        fromDate - From this date
        toDate - To this date
        Returns:
        The highest volatility currency (or EUR if no comparable date)

      • getMaxVolatilityWeek

        public int getMaxVolatilityWeek(java.lang.String currency,
                                int year)
        This method finds the week with the highest volatility of specified currency.
        Parameters:
        currency - The currency you would like to find the week with the highest volatility.
        year - The year you want to investigate. Currently years 2014 and 2013 are supported.
        Returns:
        The week number of the week with the highest volatility.

      • getAverage

        public java.math.BigDecimal getAverage(java.lang.String currency,
                                       java.time.LocalDate fromDate,
                                       java.time.LocalDate toDate,
                                       java.time.DayOfWeek weekDay)
        This method calculates the average rate on a specific day of the week in a given period.
        Parameters:
        currency - The currency you would like to see the conversion rate of
        fromDate - From this date
        toDate - To this date
        weekDay - The weekday you want the average rate of
        Returns:
        The average rate of specified currency on this day of the week inside this period
